dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- Andrea Kay
dmca.body:
November 2, 2005 

Google, Inc.
Attn: Blogger Legal Support, DMCA complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy
Mountain View, CA 94043

The following is in response to my e-mail informing you that your site is posting one of my copyrighted articles without my permission. I am following your format, as you requested. My request to you is to receive a timely response to this issue.

1. The copyrighted work is my article and is owned solely by me. It appears on my Website, at this link: http://www.andreakay.com/worklife/art_8016.html

2. The material that is infringing upon my copyrighted work that I referenced in #1 above, is a posting of my entire article that appears to have been posted on your site October 30, 2006. As I have shared in my previous correspondence, the direct link to this page on which my copyrighted article is posted without my permission is: 
http://best-homebusiness.blogspot.com/2006/10/home-business-ideas.html

3. My email address is andrea@andreakay.com.

4. I have good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.

5. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

6. My signature:
